thread.title: Fantastic Midtown Hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic Midtown Hotel - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ross K
title: Fantastic Midtown Hotel
text: My third time in NY and I stayed here for 3 days and can’t recommend it enough for a great midtown location. It’s up the street from The Garden, The Empire State, Macy’s and The Flatiron Building is just around the corner. The staff were very welcoming, helpful, professional and the hotel is very nice. As a New York Rangers fan from the UK I’ll be coming back and definitely staying here again!
